**Execute comprehensive exploration using the browser agent in PARALLEL BATCHES:**
```bash
# Fire off these browser agent commands in batch to parallelize discovery
batch [
  browser "find . -type f -name '*.json' | head -20",
  browser "find . -type f -name '*.md' | head -10", 
  browser "ls -la",
```
